name: Rift Looter
description:
Travel back in time to collect items and survive the horror from northern Sweden...

Game jam 48h with the theme "Norrland".

Controls

Combat mode - Hold Space

Mouse - interact

Introduction

The year is 30XX and the world is in chaos.  Scientists investigate the cause and you are sent back in time to gather data.

Destination: Norrland 

Time: 2020s

The time rift is only open for 5 minutes.  Gather as many critical objects as possible and escape. The future of mankind is dependent on your success.

Credits

Programming & Graphics - Christoffer Lundberg

Music - Lukas Markström
